text: A mother ready to end it I am a mother of two kiddos  I have had depression since a teenager and it s gotten progressively worse throughout my life  I am now   Got out of abusive relationship a few months ago  I have no job atm  I am a CNA an have been for   years  I don t want to go back into this field  Any of you that work in the medical field no how mental an physical draining this is  I don t think i could honestly handle that type of work right now  I have applied in different areas of work and nothing has planned out yet  I don t have much support from family  I have boyfriend that is there for me but he does not know about my depression at all  I m honestly afraid if I told him it would change things between us  I am also a heavy drug user abuser  I literally do anything and everything I can get my hands on to try to dull the pain  I feel so alone  I have debated going to rehab but have never done so before and I m scared shitless just thinking about it  I have been to psych before and found no help there either  I feel like I m at my wits ends  I wanna hang on for my kids but at this point I feel they would be better off without  there drug addicted jobless mother
summary: Mother-of-two is depressed and depressed about her relationship. She is a CNA and a heavy drug user. She doesn't want to go to rehab. She wants to hang on for her kids, but she feels they would be better off without her.
